name: High Orc
text: DIEEEEE!!!!!

name: Hebiko
text: Too slow!
*Shunk*...!
Hebiko's kodachi cut down the umpteenth High Orc.

name: Announcer
text: And the winner is... Miss Hebiko!!!! Unbelievable, she took them all down!!

name: Spectators
text: WOOOOOOO!!!!

name: Spectators
text: Hebiko-chan, so strong!!!

name: Spectators
text: A new star is born in Chaos Arena!

name: Hebiko
text: Haah... haah... C'mon, what is going on!?
The Orcs had been pretty strong, but they were no match for Hebiko who, despite being a student, had accumulated experience as a Taimanin.

name: Hebiko
text: Good thing Hebiko diligently attended the training lessons... And Hebiko's head feels clearer after moving around.
Maybe her blood had started to circulate because of the battle, but Hebiko's memories were becoming clearer little by little.
Going to the Nisha mansion with Hotaru-senpai and getting abducted by Fürst, who had appeared during the mission.

name: Hebiko
text: Which means... maybe this is Fürst's hideout?

name: Announcer
text: Honored attendees, we've kept you waiting long enough!!

name: Spectators
text: WOOOOOOOO!!!
The crowd cheered especially loudly, interrupting Hebiko's thoughts.

name: Hebiko
text: Wh-What is it this time...?

name: Announcer
text: At last, it's the person you've allllll been waiting for!!!
In the area illuminated by the spotlight, a lone woman was walking down the aisle, basking in the raucous cheers.
She approached Hebiko slowly and traced her cheek with her fingernail, looking as if she was going to lick Hebiko's face.

name: Woman
text: Oh my, aren't you a cute one♪

name: Hebiko
text: Y-You are...?

name: Woman
text: I am Snake Lady. Nice to meet you, my dear♪

name: Hebiko
text: N-Nice to meet you...?

name: Snake Lady
text: You're called Hebiko-chan, aren't you? Hmhmhm, we're both named after the same animal, perhaps we're linked by fate♪

name: Hebiko
text: Y-Yeah, maybe... ahaha...

name: Hebiko
text: Ehrm, umm, considering the snake connection... could you please let Hebiko go back home...?

name: Snake Lady
text: Sorry♪ That's not a proposition I can consider♪

name: Hebiko
text: Ugh... knew it. Th-Then at least tell Hebiko! What on earth is this place is?

name: Snake Lady
text: This is Chaos Arena♪ An arena for female warriors♪

name: Hebiko
text: Chaos... Arena?

name: Snake Lady
text: Yes, Hebiko-chan, you're now one of Chaos Arena's exclusive female warriors♪

name: Hebiko
text: Eeh!? What, no way! Hebiko refuses!!!

name: Snake Lady
text: Oh♪ So you would answer my kindness with spite?

name: Hebiko
text: K-Kindness...? What kindness is that exactly...?

name: Snake Lady
text: The kindness of buying you from that bald scoundrel Fürst♪ For a really high price♪

name: Hebiko
text: S-So that's how Hebiko got here...
She was finally able to connect the dots between her abduction by Fürst and her current situation.

name: Snake Lady
text: Did you want to try going to that baldie's place? You surely would have had a really, really bad time there♪

name: Hebiko
text: Ah, that's... umm... thank you... very much... ahaha.
She thought she was having a thoroughly bad time right now, but Hebiko swallowed her complaints. There was nothing for her to gain in upsetting Snake Lady.

name: Hebiko
text: B-But why did you save Hebiko?

name: Snake Lady
text: I'm interested in Hebiko-chan's friend♪ So Hebiko-chan is a hostage, or more like bait to lure him out♪

name: Hebiko
text: H-Him?
Was it Gaiza or Fuma? Or Shikanosuke... no, no chance of that. Either way, if she was a hostage, then at least she most likely wouldn't be killed for now.

name: Hebiko
text: I-In that case... Hebiko will sit down quietly and be a great hostage...!

name: Snake Lady
text: You can't♪

name: Snake Lady
text: Look at the spectators♪ At their burning vengeance and desire!
Hebiko looked around at the spectator seats as she was told to, and the enthusiastic guests were shaking their fists and screaming half-crazed.

name: Spectators
text: Kill her, torture her!!!!

name: Spectators
text: Smash that stuck up bitch Taimanin to pieces!

name: Hebiko
text: Ugh...
Hearing the raw sadism in their yells, Hebiko began to feel nauseated.

name: Snake Lady
text: The female warriors of Chaos Arena, you see, are a spectacle and also an object to bet on♪

name: Snake Lady
text: There's plenty of money being wagered on you as well, money that will multiply with each win♪

name: Snake Lady
text: But if you lose, you will receive a terrible punishment♪ A punishment for making people lose their money♪

name: Hebiko
text: Th-That's not fair!

name: Snake Lady
text: While everyone hopes the fighter they bet on will win, they are also expecting those fighters to experience a punishment worse than death when they lose...♪

name: Snake Lady
text: Win or lose, they can enjoy themselves. Isn't this the greatest show imaginable? Hmhmhm!

name: Hebiko
text: A punishment worse than death... but then...

name: Snake Lady
text: Oh, don't worry, Hebiko-chan. You will have a special guarantee on your life♪ Because you're my hostage♪

name: Snake Lady
text: Though, via battle or punishment, you may lose a limb or whatnot...♪
Snake Lady patted Hebiko's head as though she were enjoying herself. Her demeanor was completely unguarded, showing not even a shred of wariness.
Rather than throwing herself into a fight that could mean her end at any moment...
What about cutting down Snake Lady right here and escaping?
Hebiko discreetly grabbed her ninjato, but at that moment...

name: Snake Lady
text: Do you intend to challenge me?
When had she moved? Snake Lady stood behind Hebiko, lifting Hebiko's hair up and licking her ear all over.

name: Hebiko
text: Hyaah...!?

name: Snake Lady
text: I don't mind if we start with a game to decide who is punished, though.

name: Hebiko
text: Ah... I-I won't challenge you...
Hebiko had goosebumps all over her body. Snake Lady's lack of vigilance had not been carelessness. It was the confidence that she could take down Hebiko at any time.

name: Snake Lady
text: Your next opponent will be a bit stronger♪ Go on, hang in there and survive♪

name: Announcer
text: After winning her exhibition match, Miss Hebiko will now attempt the battle as an official female warrior of Chaos Arena!!

name: Snake Lady
text: Your next opponents will be those sweeties♪
In response to Snake Lady's voice, a beast-like roar could be heard from the entrance to the arena.

name: Monster
text: UGHRRRRR...

name: Hebiko
text: !? Are those... Trolls!?
Lumbering into the arena came monsters with giant bodies, at least three meters tall.
They were Trolls, a race of demi-humans dwelling in the Devildom. They had low intelligence, but were ferocious and monstrously strong, and above all else, they were said to be tough as nails.
Their favorite food was the flesh of women. They would capture other species indiscriminately and eat them alive.

name: Hebiko
text: Didn't a teacher say... if you're caught by one, suicide is recommended. Haha, good thing Hebiko is always studiously attending lessons...

name: Hebiko
text: ...Not the time to be joking around! Hebiko has got to get serious right from the start...
Hebiko prepared herself for the worst and unleashed the power of "Beastified Taimanin."

name: Hebiko
text: It's alright... Hebiko will get through this!

name: Announcer
text: Now then! Miss Hebiko's real fight begins!

name: Spectators
text: WOAAAHHHHHH!!!!!
